p.k: HKFC je jednou z předních MMA promocí, která přináší elitní a začínající atlety na světovou úroveň
p.d: HKFC is one of the world’s premier MMA promotions, showcasing elite up and coming athletes on a global stage. With over 50 events, HKFC, has earned a reputation of being a world class organization, through its global audience and draw of talent. Athletes such as Ronda Rousey, Elias Theodorou, and Misha Cirkunov used HKFC as a staging ground for their UFC careers.
